name: Battle Formation
overview: Battle Formation is an strategy game that features villains from the Kamen Rider, Ultraman & Gundam series, and the goal of the game is to conquer the World. The game takes place in a World Map in which the player plays against another human player or the computer to reach the end level of the world in the first place. In each the player can use money to buy new units and use them to conquer new territories.
